name: Starfield (itch) (joeAmerica Gayms)
description:
Starfield

Climb through tunnels and air ducts as you fight fascist robots to save Prince Starfield

Up Arrow - Jump/Stand/Pullup

Left/Right Arrows - Move Left/Roll

Down arrow- Duck/Crawl

X-Arm your weapon

Z-Interact/Fire   

Robots have taken over the ship! Unlock computer consoles to make you're way around the ship as you fight the evil scourge. 

Reach the Medical bay to restore your health 

Recharge the shield in the engine room.

Stand still without your weapon drawn to investigate.
